name: Fx NewTab with Firefox logo
description:
Another--simpler (compared to style 95123)--dark background for the Firefox New Tab page -- comes in red (default--because firefoxes are mostly red), green, blue, and magenta (to match your theme). Edit the code to select/uncomment a different color (or create your own).

This one simply uses the Firefox logo built-in to every release of Firefox (varies with the release).

user.name: mod_wastrel
user.about: Have keyboard, will code. Have pillow, will nap. (Decisions, decisions...) Status: Offline
